name: DEATH ANIMAL PARADE
description:
"March on! March on! Lead the DEATH ANIMAL PARADE and March on!"

DEATH ANIMAL PARADE is a casual strategy game.
Choose members from among animals and set out for the parade.
The success of the Parade in the town overflowing with wild animals depends on your leadership.

This game progresses in real-time. The animals will automatically attack as time passes, but the player needs to give instructions on their formation.

The animals have unique characteristics. Bringing out their traits correctly is the shortcut to victory.

Have a nice parade!
